dcterms:creator: Jon Ander Campos
Arantxa Otegi
Aitor Soroa
Jan Deriu
Mark Cieliebak
Eneko Agirre
dcterms:description: DoQA is a dataset with 2,437 dialogues and 10,917 QA pairs, collected from three Stack Exchange sites using the Wizard of Oz method with crowdsourcing. It focuses on real user needs and provides a more coherent and natural conversational QA experience.
dcterms:title: DoQA

dcterms:creator: S. Reddy
D. Chen
C. D. Manning
dcterms:description: CoQA is a conversational question answering dataset that includes 127k questions with answers obtained from 8k conversations about passages from various domains.
dcterms:title: CoQA

dcterms:creator: E. Choi
H. He
M. Iyyer
M. Yatskar
W. Yih
Y. Choi
P. Liang
L. Zettlemoyer
dcterms:description: QuAC is a dataset that contains 14k information-seeking question answering dialogues about specific sections in Wikipedia articles, where the answerer has access to the full section text.
dcterms:title: QuAC

dcterms:creator: M. Iyyer
W. Yih
M. W. Chang
dcterms:description: SequentialQA is a dataset that comprises 6K question sequences posed over the content of Wikipedia tables, designed to answer complex queries by decomposing them into sequences of single, co-referent queries.
dcterms:title: SequentialQA

dcterms:creator: T. Nguyen
M. Rosenberg
X. Song
J. Gao
S. Tiwary
R. Majumder
L. Deng
dcterms:description: MS MARCO is a human-generated machine reading comprehension dataset designed to evaluate the performance of machine reading systems.
dcterms:title: MS MARCO

dcterms:creator: P. Rajpurkar
R. Jia
P. Liang
dcterms:description: SQuAD is a dataset consisting of over 100,000 questions for machine comprehension of text, including unanswerable questions.
dcterms:title: SQuAD

dcterms:creator: M. Dunn
L. Sagun
M. Higgins
V. U. G¨uney
V. Cirik
K. Cho
dcterms:description: SearchQA is a new Q&A dataset augmented with context from a search engine, designed to improve question answering systems.
dcterms:title: SearchQA

dcterms:creator: T. Koˇcisk´y
J. Schwarz
P. Blunsom
C. Dyer
K. M. Hermann
G. Melis
E. Grefenstette
dcterms:description: NarrativeQA is a reading comprehension challenge dataset that focuses on understanding narratives and answering questions based on them.
dcterms:title: NarrativeQA
